thread.title: Chelsea Clinton Defends Barron Trump's Right to Just Be a Kid
thread.title_full: Chelsea Clinton Defends Barron Trump's Right to Just Be a Kid

author: Just Jared
title: Chelsea Clinton Defends Barron Trump's Right to Just Be a Kid
text:
Chelsea Clinton is speaking out to defend President Trump ‘s 10-year-old son Barron Trump from critics and to let people know he deserves to just be a child.
The 36-year-old former First Daughter was just 12-years-old when her dad Bill Clinton became president in 1993, so she definitely understands what Barron is going through right now.
While Chelsea is sticking up for Barron, she doesn’t have the same stance for the president.
Click inside to read what Chelsea Clinton tweeted… 
“ Barron Trump deserves the chance every child does-to be a kid. Standing up for every kid also means opposing @POTUS policies that hurt kids,” she tweeted on Sunday morning (January 22).
Chelsea ‘s tweet comes after Barron has been hit with lots of cyberbullying following his appearance at the presidential inauguration a few days ago.
Barron Trump deserves the chance every child does-to be a kid. Standing up for every kid also means opposing @POTUS policies that hurt kids.
— Chelsea Clinton (@ChelseaClinton) January 22, 2017
